announcements.title: Attention Transfer Students
announcements.description: Transfer students must submit a form by the end of this week.

announcements.title: New dress code
announcements.description: There will be a new dress code in effect beginning next week.

announcements.title: No classes next Monday
announcements.description: Due to the potentially dangerous nature of the eclipse, there will be no classes held next Monday, August 21st. Take this opportunity to safely view a rare natural phenomenon!
